name: Petrol Magnate Idle Tycoon
description:
🎉 Welcome to Petrol Magnate!!!
This is a casual clicker game in which you have to start with a small gas station and rise to the level of a fuel tycoon with an income of trillions of dollars.
🌏 Choose Your favorite country and start building an "Empire", buy gas stations, improve, develop your business and open franchises around the world. ⛽  🚗 

You can choose from 5 countries, each with 3 cities. By opening Franchises in all 3 cities of the current country, You can move to new countries and start a new business there
Each franchise gives You a bonus to income, with which you can develop much faster in a new country.
You can hire gas stations that will fill up the cars themselves, and You do not have to constantly monitor this.
The gas stations themselves will collect the profit even if you are not there, and you can return at any time to collect the profit.
But do not leave them alone for a long time, because without You, the business will not grow steadily.
So go ahead, build Your own Empire!!! 🚀 🚀 🚀
_
💬 We will be happy to answer all Your questions and hear your suggestions on the @Shellbee_games page on Instagram

P.S.
We transfer part of the game's revenue to a charity that helps seriously ill children, so you don't just play, but also help those in need around the world.
Thank you for your support:) 💛
